sub_title: Safety Culture Coach/HSE Consultant üîò ISO Lead Implementer
summary:
‚óè Senior HSSE Advisor/Manager, +17 years‚Äô experience in energy (onshore & offshore), energy services, power generation, engineering, housing, construction. Led HSSE projects with Touchstone (Canada HQ), IDB Shell Globall (UK HQ).  Worked with global energy majors: Stork formerly RBG (Netherlands HQ) and bpTT (UK HQ). Managed strategic HSSE at a national level for Trinidad & Tobago‚Äôs only oil refinery (Petrotrin), its largest independent power producer (PowerGen), T&T‚Äôs main distributor of natural gas (NGC) as well as the largest provider of low-cost housing (state).
‚óè Copped several career Performance Awards: Outstanding HSSE Performance, 2021 and 2020, HSSE Excellence Awards 2014 and 2015. Delivered industry presentations at national HSSE conferences. Served on several national public and private sector HSSE committees, former Chair of the largest energy industrial estate association.
‚óè In addition to several academic qualifications, ISO Lead Implementer and NEBOSH certified. 
‚óè Highly skilled at developing HSSE Management Systems, Safety Culture Transformation, Risk Assessment & Management, Regulatory Compliance, Continuous Improvement, Incident Command Systems, Project & Contractor Management, ISO Auditing,	HSSE Policies & Procedures, People Management/Training, Technical Report Writing.

ùóñùóÆùóøùó≤ùó≤ùóø ùóõùó∂ùó¥ùóµùóπùó∂ùó¥ùóµùòÅùòÄ
‚óè Successfully obtained Certificate of Environmental Clearance (CEC) for NGC Touchstone Cascadura Pipeline Project.
‚óè Coordinator, Beachfield/Shell Trinidad (UK HQ) Environmental Risk Identification (ENVID), December 2021.
‚óè Executed >50 Leadership Site Field Assessments, increased worker engagement by 60% for 2019-2021.
‚óè Completed 69 high-level HSSE compliance audits in 51 Energy Companies, 18 Production Alliance Companies.
‚óè Led preparation of an HSSE Contractor Management Programme, oversaw 2,000 contractors.
‚óè Project Manager: benchmarking of Petrotrin‚Äôs safety culture by Health Safety Laboratory (UK).
‚óè Created and implemented a Safety Culture Transformation Exercise which included a 5-year Road Map Hazard Identification, Near-Miss Reporting, Safety Coaching, and Accident Reporting with Shell Global Solutions (USA).
‚óè Led Greenhouse Gas Inventory/CO2 reduction projects with Inter-American Development Bank (IDB) 2011-2012.
‚óè Coordinated 12 Emergency Response Community Drills, interfaced with 15 regulatory and State agencies.
